title: Grind: MMF Bisexual Romance
description: Beneath the neon glow of a downtown city, a world of secrets and forbidden temptations unfolds. Impulsive and dreamy, Juliette finds her routine night as a designated driver shattered by a chance encounter with two captivating men with a magnetic allure - Bryson, a charismatic artist, and Cain, a suave financier. Their encounter sparks a game of sensual stakes and emotional revelations.The on-and-off lovers, Bryson and Cain, have always sensed an absence in their fiery relationship. Juliette, a klutzy brunette who mesmerizes them, unexpectedly filled that void. Determined to guide her through her uncharted desires, they embark on a journey of passion and discovery.As passions flare, they must navigate their tangled hearts. Julietteâ€™s dreams morph into a reality more intoxicating than she ever imagined. But can the trio find a balance in a world where hearts and bodies intertwine, or will their connection burn too bright?
author: Leah Harrison
